question: You are speaking with an existing Member.  What should you say to transition into the Member Review?
briefing: In this Module, you will learn what to say for transitioning to the Member Review after Problem Resolution, the New Member Entry Line, and the Existing Member Entry Line

keyElements.script: Thank you for being a Cohen Brownl Credit Union Member, we appreciate the opportunity to serve you.
It's my responsibility to help Members achieve their financial goals and make their banking more convenient .

Circumstances for our Members typically change over time , and we are implementing a way to better understand our Member's current and future financial needs , and look for all the ways to be helpful to them.
I have helped others save time and money , and I would like to ask you a few questions to see if we can do the same for you.
This usually takes only about 10-15 minutes .
It is a complimentary service we provide and, of course , everything will remain confidential .
I'd like to get started right now .
